00024        virtual void SetSegmentData(int segmentIndex, const SegmentData& data);

00045 template<class SegmentData>
00046 inline const iser::ISerializable& TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::GetSegmentData(int segmentIndex) const
00047 {
00048        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex >= 0);
00049        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex < int(m_segmentsData.size()));
00050        return m_segmentsData[segmentIndex];
00051 }
00052

00054 template<class SegmentData>

00056 {
00057        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex >= 0);
00058        I_ASSERT(segmentIndex < int(m_segmentsData.size()));
00059 
00060        m_segmentsData[segmentIndex] = data;
00061 }

00064 template<class SegmentData>
00065 inline bool TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::RemoveSegment(int node, int segment)
00066 {
00067        I_ASSERT(node >= 0);
00068        I_ASSERT(segment >= 0);
00069        I_ASSERT(segment < int(m_segmentsData.size()));
00070 
00071        node %= GetNodesCount();
00072        ::std::vector<SegmentData>::iterator iter = m_segmentsData.begin();
00073        iter += segment;
00074        m_segmentsData.erase(iter);
00075 
00076        return RemoveNode(node);
00077 }

00082 template<class SegmentData>
00083 inline bool TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::InsertNode(const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00084 {
00085        int lastSegmentIndex = GetSegmentsCount() - 1;
00086 
00087        if (BaseClass::InsertNode(node)){
00088               int segmentsCount = GetSegmentsCount();
00089               if (lastSegmentIndex >= 0){
00090                      m_segmentsData.resize(segmentsCount, m_segmentsData[lastSegmentIndex]);
00091               }
00092               else{
00093                      m_segmentsData.resize(segmentsCount);
00094               }
00095               return true;
00096        }
00097 
00098        return false;
00099 }

00102 template<class SegmentData>
00103 inline bool TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::InsertNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00104 {
00105        int nodesCount = GetNodesCount();
00106        if (nodesCount >= 1){
00107               SegmentData newSegment;
00108 
00109               if (nodesCount == 1){
00110                      m_segmentsData.push_back(newSegment);
00111                      if (IsClosed()){
00112                             m_segmentsData.push_back(newSegment);
00113                      }
00114               }
00115               else{
00116                      if(index == 0){
00117                             if (IsClosed()){
00118                                    newSegment = m_segmentsData.back();
00119                             }
00120                             else{
00121                                    newSegment = m_segmentsData.front();
00122                             }
00123                      }
00124                      else{
00125                             if (index >= nodesCount){
00126                                    newSegment = m_segmentsData.back();
00127                             }
00128                             else{
00129                                    newSegment = m_segmentsData[index - 1];
00130                             }
00131                      }
00132 
00133                      ::std::vector<SegmentData>::iterator iter = m_segmentsData.begin();
00134                      iter += index;
00135 
00136                      m_segmentsData.insert(iter, newSegment);
00137               }
00138        }
00139 
00140        return BaseClass::InsertNode(index, node);
00141 }

00146 {
00147        m_segmentsData.clear();
00148        BaseClass::Clear();

00154 template<class SegmentData>
00155 inline void TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::SetClosed(bool state)
00156 {
00157        if (IsClosed() == state){
00158               return;
00159        }
00160 
00161        if (state){
00162               m_segmentsData.push_back(m_segmentsData.back());
00163        }
00164        else{
00165               m_segmentsData.pop_back();
00166        }
00167 
00168        BaseClass::SetClosed(state);
00169 }

00174 template<class SegmentData>
00175 inline bool TPolylineEx<SegmentData>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00176 {
00177        int segmentsCount = GetSegmentsCount();
00178        bool retVal = true;
00179 
00180        retVal = retVal && BaseClass::Serialize(archive);
00181 
00182        static iser::CArchiveTag polylineExTag("PolylineEx", "PolylineEx");
00183        static iser::CArchiveTag segmentTag("Segment", "Segment Data");
00184 
00185        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(polylineExTag, segmentTag, segmentsCount);
00186 
00187        if (!archive.IsStoring() && retVal){
00188               m_segmentsData.resize(segmentsCount);
00189        }
00190 
00191        for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < segmentsCount; ++segmentIndex){
00192               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(segmentTag);
00193               retVal = retVal && m_segmentsData[segmentIndex].Serialize(archive);
00194               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(segmentTag);
00195        }
00196        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(polylineExTag);
00197 
00198        return retVal;
00199 }
